00018 template <class Layer, class View = IShapeView>
00019 class TLayerBase: public Layer
00020 {
00021 public:
00022        typedef Layer BaseClass;
00023        using BaseClass::GetBoundingBox;
00024 
00025        TLayerBase();
00026        virtual ~TLayerBase();
00027 
00028        View* GetTViewPtr() const;
00029 
00030        // reimplemented (ILayer)
00031        virtual void OnConnectView(IShapeView* viewPtr);
00032        virtual void OnDisconnectView(IShapeView* viewPtr);
00033        virtual IShapeView* GetViewPtr() const;
00034        virtual bool IsVisible() const;
00035        virtual void SetVisible(bool state = true);
00036 
00037        // reimplemented (IDisplay)
00038        virtual IDisplay* GetParentDisplayPtr() const;
00039        virtual const CScreenTransform& GetTransform() const;
00040        virtual i2d::CRect GetClientRect() const;
00041     virtual const IColorShema& GetColorShema() const;
00042        virtual void OnAreaInvalidated(const i2d::CRect& prevArea, const i2d::CRect& newArea);
00043 
00044 private:
00045        View* m_viewPtr;
00046        bool m_isVisible;
00047 };
00048 
00049 
00050 template <class Layer, class View>
00051 inline bool TLayerBase<Layer, View>::IsVisible() const
00052 {
00053        return m_isVisible;
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 template <class Layer, class View>
00058 inline void TLayerBase<Layer, View>::SetVisible(bool state)
00059 {
00060        if (m_isVisible != state){
00061               m_isVisible = state;
00062 
00063               if (m_isVisible){
00064                      OnAreaInvalidated(i2d::CRect::GetEmpty(), GetBoundingBox());
00065               }
00066               else{
00067                      OnAreaInvalidated(GetBoundingBox(), i2d::CRect::GetEmpty());
00068               }
00069        }
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 // public methods
00074 
00075 template <class Layer, class View>
00076 TLayerBase<Layer, View>::TLayerBase()
00077 {
00078        m_viewPtr = NULL;
00079        m_isVisible = true;
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 template <class Layer, class View>
00084 TLayerBase<Layer, View>::~TLayerBase()
00085 {
00086        if (m_viewPtr != NULL){
00087               int layerIndex = m_viewPtr->GetLayerIndex(*this);
00088               I_ASSERT(layerIndex >= 0);
00089 
00090               m_viewPtr->RemoveLayer(layerIndex);
00091        }
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 template <class Layer, class View>
00096 View* TLayerBase<Layer, View>::GetTViewPtr() const
00097 {
00098        I_ASSERT(m_viewPtr != NULL);
00099 
00100        return m_viewPtr;
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00104 // reimplemented (ILayer)
00105 
00106 template <class Layer, class View>
00107 void TLayerBase<Layer, View>::OnConnectView(IShapeView* viewPtr)
00108 {
00109        I_ASSERT(m_viewPtr == NULL);
00110        I_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
00111 
00112        m_viewPtr = viewPtr;
00113 }
00114 
00115 
00116 template <class Layer, class View>
00117 void TLayerBase<Layer, View>::OnDisconnectView(IShapeView* I_IF_DEBUG(viewPtr))
00118 {
00119        I_ASSERT(m_viewPtr == viewPtr);
00120        I_ASSERT(viewPtr != NULL);
00121 
00122        m_viewPtr = NULL;
00123 }
00124 
00125 
00126 template <class Layer, class View>
00127 IShapeView* TLayerBase<Layer, View>::GetViewPtr() const
00128 {
00129        return GetTViewPtr();
00130 }

00133 // reimplemented (IDisplay)

00168 
00169 template <class Layer, class View>
00170 void TLayerBase<Layer, View>::OnAreaInvalidated(const i2d::CRect& prevArea, const i2d::CRect& newArea)
00171 {
00172        I_ASSERT(this->GetBoundingBox().IsInside(newArea));
00173 
00174        if (m_viewPtr != NULL){
00175               m_viewPtr->OnLayerInvalidated(*this, prevArea, newArea);
00176        }
00177 }
